t24:tooltip.t24:translation: Identifies the contract code of the transaction
The name of the stock exchange
Indicates the Maturity Date of the Transaction
Identifies the customer account
Type of event - Dividend Payment/Bonus etc.
Buy or Sell?
Last Date by which a customer may exercise option
Indicates value date for online charges raised
The Reference currency of the Portfolio
Currency of this Account
Indicates the address where advice to be sent
Indicates the order number
Counterparty with whom the deal is made
Customer Liability
Specifies the Dealer Desk handling the transaction
Department Account Officer
Statement or category entry of a transaction
Indicates activity code
indicates the date on which activity is generated
Reference No of the delivery message generated
Indicates the limit that will be updated
Identifies the currency of the transaction
Specifies the size of the contract
Position Type
Additional information defined locally
Type of option to be chosen like call or put
Indicates the start of the fee charging period
Indicates the date of premium payment
Specifies the amount of premium
Specifies the number of lots to be transferred
Specifies the internal recipient customer
Indicates the Portfolio Account of the customer
Indicates the Portfolio Account of the customer
Specifies receiver counterparty
Specifies the receiver bank name
Specifies the receiver bank address
Specifies the receiver bank's sort code
The price at which the trade is being done
Indicates whether fee is required or not
Specifies the link to a record in EB.ADVICES
Identifies whether it is an exotic event
Identifies tht filled lots
Specifies the price of the filled lots
Defines the tax type
The structured product deal reference number
